HomePage.lead: Xipi Labs focuses on building practical, user-friendly, and creative AI applications that empower the creativity of individuals and businesses.
HomePage.brand_slogan: Exploring Creativity and the Future with AI
HomePage.core_products_subtitle: Focusing on education & entertainment, developer tools, and image efficiency.
HomePage.product1_title: TaleWeaver: AI Parent-Child Picture Book Reading
HomePage.product1_description: Unleash your and your child's imagination. With just one theme, generate beautifully illustrated picture books with professional layouts and support for multiple voice readings.
HomePage.product2_description: An AI prototyping platform for developers and creative teams, offering visual workflow orchestration, debugging, and export capabilities to quickly bring ideas to life.
HomePage.product3_description: One-click removal of unwanted elements from photos with intelligent background filling, achieving pixel-perfect, seamless restoration to boost efficiency for photography and e-commerce teams.
